title: Man, 76, arrested as summer camp children fall ill

title: Woman missing after giving birth in Walthamstow underpass
description: Police are "extremely concerned" for the welfare of the woman after she gave birth in east London.
content:
Police say they are "extremely concerned" for the welfare of a mother who gave birth before going missing in east London.
Officers received reports that the woman, who is believed to be called Anne Marie and was sleeping rough, gave birth at the Bill... [446 chars]

title: Nine out of 10 nurses in England, Wales and Northern Ireland reject pay award
description: Royal College of Nursing urges ministers to improve 3.6% offer to avoid industrial action ballot later this year
content:
Nine out of 10 nurses have rejected their 3.6% pay award for this year and warned that they could strike later this year unless their salaries are improved.
In an indicative vote among members of the Royal College of Nursing (RCN) in England, Wales a... [3234 chars]

title: Hotel tycoon announces expansion plan for Heathrow Airport which includes shorter third runway
description: The billionaire's Arora Group said they are proposing a shorter new runway which would avoid the costly need to divert the M25 motorway.
content:
Hotel tycoon Surinder Arora has put forward an expansion plan for Heathrow which rivals that by the airport's owners.
The billionaire's Arora Group said they are proposing a shorter new runway which would avoid the costly need to divert the M25 motor... [2178 chars]

title: Ofcom investigates 34 porn sites over UK age verification
description: Ofcom said on Friday that more than 6,000 porn sites would begin verifying users, but it believes some are ignoring the new rules.
content:
Ofcom is investigating four companies, operating a total of 34 porn sites, over whether they are complying with its new age check requirements.
The regulator said on Friday more than 6,000 sites allowing pornography and other adult content would star... [448 chars]
